prompts: Create a Pokemon that resembles a small purple creature with large blue wings.
I want a character design for a mischievous bug-like Pokemon with a playful personality.
Generate a creature that has a unique blend of purple and blue colors along with sharp claws.
Make an image of a flying-type Pokemon that looks like a small, playful bat.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in forests and mountains, featuring vibrant purple and blue colors.
Design a small, winged creature with a crab-like appearance and energetic demeanor.
Show me a Pokemon that has a mix of insect and bat characteristics, perfect for a fantasy world.
